name: EnergyBoy (LudumDare39)
description:
You are a robot on a lonely planet. But suddenly aliens start attacking you. Place turrets and other defence units to protect your generators, which prevent you from running out of power!

Instructions:

  • Move with WASD
  • Buildings and you consume energy, if energy drops below zero, you lose
  • Generators produce energy
  • Select a building to place with the scroll wheel
  • Place buildings with left mouse button and remove them with the right mouse button at the green square in front of you
  • Buildings cost gears, which are dropped by enemies
  • Towers (Turrets and Mortars) shoot at enemies, killing them
  • Survive as long as possible!

Ludum Dare

This game was created during the Ludum Dare Game Jam 39. Link to our submission.
